alert.note: Alert for James City; King William; King and Queen; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:28PM EDT until June 27 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KING AND QUEEN...NORTHEASTERN NEW KENT... SOUTHEASTERN KING WILLIAM AND NORTHWESTERN JAMES CITY COUNTIES... At 1028 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Point, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... West Point around 1040 PM EDT. Little Plymouth around 1045 PM EDT. Shacklefords around 1050 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mattaponi, Holly Forks, Eltham, Mascot, Cooke, Velma, Romancoke, Cohoke, Plum Point and Gressit. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: James City; King William; King and Queen; New Kent
